Verses: 1 aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa, Yoodhaavin Raajaakkalaagiya Usiyaa, Yodhaam, Aagaas, Esekkiyaa Enbavargalin Naatkalil, Yoodhaavaiyum Erusalemaiyum Kuriththuk Kanda Dharisanam.
2 vaanangale, Kelungal; Boomiye, Sevikodu; Karththar Pesugiraar; Naan Pillaigalai Valarththu Aadhariththen; Avargalo Enakku Virodhamaaik Kalagampanninaargal.
3 maadu Than Ejamaanaiyum, Kazhudhai Than Aandavanin Munnanaiyaiyum Ariyum; Isravelo Arivillaamalum, En Janam Unarvillaamalum Irukkiradhu Engiraar.

4 aiyo, Paavamulla Jaadhiyum, Akkiramaththaal Paaranjumandha Janamum, Pollaadhavargalin Sandhadhiyum, Kedu Undaakkugira Puththirarumaayirukkiraargal; Karththaraivittu, Isravelin Parisuththarukkuk Kobamundaakki, Pinvaangipponaargal.
5 innum Neengal En Adikkappadavendum? Adhigamaai Vilagippogireergale; Thalaiyellaam Vyaadhiyum, Irudhayamellaam Palatchayamumaai Irukkiradhu.

6 ullankaal Thodangi Uchchanthalaimattum Adhile Sugamillai; Adhu Kaayamum Veekkamum, Nodhikkira Ranamumulladhu; Adhu Seezh Pidhukkappadaamalum, Kattappadaamalum, Enneyinaal Aatrappadaamalum Irukkiradhu.

7 ungal Dhesam Paazhaayirukkiradhu; Ungal Pattanangal Akkiniyinaal Sutterikkappattadhu; Ungal Naattai Anniyar Ungal Kangalukku Munbaagap Patchikkiraargal; Adhu Anniyaraal Kavizhkkappatta Paazhndhesam Pol Irukkiradhu.
8 seeyon Kumaaraththi Dhraatchaththottaththil Ulla Oru Kuchchupolavum Vellariththottaththilulla Oru Kudisaipolavum, Mutrikkai Podappatta Oru Pattanam Polavum Meendhirukkiraal.
9 senaigalin Karththar Namakkuk Konjam Meedhiyai Vaikkaadhirundhaaraanaal, Naam Sodhomaippolaagi, Gomoraavukku Oththiruppom.
10 sodhomin Adhipadhigale, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; Gomoraavin Janame, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Vedhaththukku Sevikodungal.

11 ungal Paligalin Thiral Enakku Ennaththukku Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Aattukkadaakkalin Thaganapaligalum, Kozhuththa Mirugangalin Ninamum Enakku Arosigamaayirukkiradhu; Kaalaigal, Aattukkuttigal, Kadaakkalin Raththaththinmel Enakkup Piriyamillai.
12 neengal En Sannidhiyil Varumpodhu, En Praagaarangalai Ippadi Midhikkavendumendru Ungalidaththil Kettadhu Yaar?

13 ini Veen Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvaravendaam; Thoobankaattudhal Enakku Aruvaruppaayirukkiradhu; Neengal Akkiramaththode Aasarikkira Maadhappirappaiyum, Oivunaalaiyum, Sabaikkoottaththaiyum Naan Ini Sagikkamaatten.
14 ungal Maadhappirappugalaiyum, Ungal Pandigaigalaiyum En Aaththumaa Verukkiradhu; Avaigal Enakku Varuththamaayirukkiradhu; Avaigalai Sumandhu Ilaiththupponen.
15 neengal Ungal Kaigalaiviriththaalum, En Kangalai Ungalaivittu Maraikkiren; Neengal Migudhiyaai Jebampanninaalum Kelen; Ungal Kaigal Raththaththinaal Niraindhirukkiradhu.
16 ungalaik Kazhuvi Suththigariyungal; Ungal Kiriyaigalin Pollaappai En Kangalukku Maraivaaga Agatrivittu, Theemaiseydhalai Vittu Oyungal;
17 nanmaiseyyap Padiyungal; Nyaayaththaith Thedungal; Odukkappattavanai Aadhariththu, Thikkatrap Pillaiyin Nyaayaththaiyum, Vidhavaiyin Vazhakkaiyum Visaariyungal.
18 vazhakkaaduvom Vaarungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Ungal Paavangal Siverendrirundhaalum Uraindha Mazhaiyaip Pol Venmaiyaagum; Avaigal Raththaambara Sivappaayirundhaalum Panjaippolaagum.
19 neengal Manamporundhi Sevikoduththaal Dhesaththin Nanmaiyaip Pusippeergal.
20 maattom Endru Edhirththunirpeergalaagil Pattayaththukku Iraiyaaveergal; Karththarin Vaai Idhai Sollitru.
21 unmaiyulla Nagaram Eppadi Vesiyaaippoyitru! Adhu Nyaayaththaal Niraindhirundhadhu, Needhi Adhil Kudikondirundhadhu; Ippozhudho Adhin Kudigal Kolaipaadhagar.
22 un Velli Kalimbaayitru; Un Dhraatcharasam Thanneerkalappaanadhu.

23 un Prabukkal Muradarum Thirudarin Thozharumaayirukkiraargal; Avargalil Ovvoruvanum Paridhaanaththai Virumbi, Kaikkooliyai Naadiththirigiraan; Thikkatra Pillaiyin Nyaayaththai Visaariyaargal; Vidhavaiyin Vazhakku Avargalidaththil Erugiradhillai.
24 aagaiyaal Senaiyin Karththarum Isravelin Vallavarumaagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhaavadhu: Ogo Naan En Saththurukkalil Kobam Aari, En Pagaignarukku Needhiyai Sarikkattuven.
25 naan En Kaiyai Unnidamaaith Thiruppi, Un Kalimbu Neenga Unnai Suththamaaip Pudamittu, Un Eeyaththaiyellaam Neekkuven.
26 un Nyaayaadhipadhigalai Munnirundhadhupolavum Un Aalosanaikkaararai Aadhiyil Irundhadhupolavum Thirumbakkattalaiyiduven; Pinbu Nee Needhipuram Endrum, Saththiyanagaram Endrum Peyar Peruvaai.
27 seeyon Nyaayaththinaalum, Adhile Thirumbi Varugiravargal Needhiyinaalum Meetkappaduvaargal.
28 dhrogigalum Paavigalumo Egamaai Norungundu Povaargal; Karththaraivittu Vilagugiravargal Nirmoolamaavaargal.
29 neengal Virumbina Karvaalimarangalinimiththam Vetkappaduveergal; Neengal Therindhukonda Thoppugalinimiththam Naanamadaiveergal.
30 ilaiyudhirndha Karvaalimaraththaippolavum, Thanneerillaadha Thoppaip Polavum Iruppeergal.
31 paraakkiramasaali Sanarkoolamum, Avan Kiriyai Akkinipporiyumaagi, Irandum Avippaarillaamal Egamaai Vendhupom Endru Sollugiraar.
